UNKNOWN_UNION_OPTION.message: Unknown type as an option of union type

ARRAY_COMPONENT_TYPE_IMPORTED_THROUGH_LI.message: Array component type '{{componentTypeName}}' imported through a library chain. Library chaining is not allowed.

NULL_NOT_ALLOWED.message: Null or undefined value is not allowed

DISCRIMINATOR_NEEDED.message: Can not discriminate types '{{name1}}' and '{{name2}}' without discriminator

SAME_DISCRIMINATOR_VALUE.message: Types '{{name1}}' and '{{name2}}' have same discriminator value

INVALID_DATTIME.message: Valid datetime formatted string is expected

LIBRARY_CHAINIG_IN_ANNOTATION_TYPE_SUPER.message: Annotation type '{{typeName}}' depends on '{{chainedType}}' imported through a library chain. Library chainig is not allowed.

REQUIRED_BOOLEAN.message: Value of 'required' facet should be boolean

UNIQUE_ITEMS_BOOLEAN.message: Value of 'uniqueItems' facet should be boolean

DISCRIMINATOR_FOR_UNION.message: You can not specify 'discriminator' for union types

DISCRIMINATOR_FOR_OBJECT.message: You only can use 'discriminator' with object types

DISCRIMINATOR_FOR_INLINE.message: You can not specify 'discriminator' for inline type declarations

SCALAR_FOR_DISCRIMINATOR.message: It is only allowed to use scalar properties as discriminators

DISCRIMINATOR_VALUE_WITHOUT_DISCRIMINATO.message: You can not use 'discriminatorValue' without declaring 'discriminator'

EXTERNAL_IN_PROPERTY_DEFINITION.message: It is not allowed to use external types in property definitions

EXTERNAL_IN_FACET_DEFINITION.message: It is not allowed to use external types in facet definitions

LIBRARY_CHAINIG_IN_PROPERTY_TYPE.message: Property '{{propName}}' refers to type '{{typeName}}' imported through a library chain. Library chainig is not allowed.

LIBRARY_CHAINIG_IN_PROPERTY_TYPE_SUPERTY.message: Property '{{propName}}' type depends on '{{typeName}}' type imported through a library chain. Library chainig is not allowed.

LIBRARY_CHAINIG_IN_FACET_TYPE.message: Facet '{{propName}}' refers to type '{{typeName}}' imported through a library chain. Library chainig is not allowed.

LIBRARY_CHAINIG_IN_FACET_TYPE_SUPERTYPE.message: Facet '{{propName}}' type depends on '{{typeName}}' type imported through a library chain. Library chainig is not allowed.
